text-heading: Sticker gallery of the art lamp light therapy project
solo_1_desc: Rest matters. Rest is important. Take a break. Lie down. Don't overwork. Drink some Coca-Cola. Watch the sunset. Read a book. Finally, get some sleep. Live. Enjoy. Life is one.
solo_2_desc: Here you can put the text for your sticker exhibition
team_1_desc: Here you can put the text for your team sticker exhibition
